mapper.sql: id, ResourceNo, ResourceType, ServiceSupplier, Address, DeptNo, UserName, EquipNo, Expenses, ChargeType, CreatorName, CreateTime, ResourceStatus
mapper.select: SELECT r.id rid, r.ResourceNo, r.ResourceType, r.ServiceSupplier, d1.isSecretary d1_isSecretary, d1.id d1id, d1.DeptName dName, d2.id d2id, d2.deptName pdName, r.UserName, r.ChargeType, r.ResourceStatus FROM resources r, department d1, department d2 WHERE r.deptNo = d1.deptNo AND d1.parentDeptNo = d2.deptNo
mapper.insert: insert into resources (id, ResourceNo, ResourceType, ServiceSupplier, Address, DeptNo, UserName, EquipNo, Expenses, ChargeType, CreatorName, CreateTime, ResourceStatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicesupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expenses,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CreatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{resourcestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into resources
id,
ResourceNo,
ResourceType,
ServiceSupplier,
Address,
DeptNo,
UserName,
EquipNo,
Expenses,

CreatorName,

mapper.update:
update resources
ResourceNo = #{resourceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ResourceType = #{resourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ServiceSupplier = #{servicesupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeptNo = #{deptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserName = #{UserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EquipNo = #{equipno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Expenses = #{expenses,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ChargeType = #{chargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreatorName = #{CreatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
ResourceStatus = #{resourcestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update resources set ResourceNo = #{resourceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ResourceType = #{resourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ServiceSupplier = #{servicesupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeptNo = #{deptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserName = #{UserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EquipNo = #{equipno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Expenses = #{expenses,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ChargeType = #{chargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreatorName = #{CreatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, ResourceStatus = #{resourcestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
